introduction: Brothels are disappearing one by one, since the special law on sex trafficking has been enforced in South Korea. Yeongdeungpo brothel is also on the verge of shutting down, being called "cleaning up the city" after Shinsegae Dept. store and Times Square mall were built. Prostitutes headed for the streets in protest, in demand for survival and their basic workers’ rights. Only seen at the fall of dusk before, these women dressed in white step out in broad daylight willing to "face death right here."
